name: Kitten Mitten
description:
When it comes to the game of catching mice, no one can even come close to you. Your child on the other hand...although very eager to do the same as you, is still quite inexperienced.

Your overprotective parental instincts kick into overdrive one day as your kitten ran out of the house determined to be just like you. 

Play as a mother cat trying to lead rats to your kitten in this puzzle game. Through shifting rocks and manipulating the direction the rats run to, lead them to your kitten to ensure he gets an easy catch!

After all, there's no greater victory than watching your child learn and succeed.

The only problem... is that you have to make sure your kitten doesn't see you trying to help him!

github repository: https://github.com/Gideonnf/GasCJam

Game controls:
WASD - to move

Group name: GasC
Group members: Angie Lim (NUS), Gideon Francis, Sam Zi Qi, Celest Poh, Stefanie

Notes: We have a windows build too, but we recommend try webGL first
